asg4 0.1.0
  • Reference
    • Reproducing Germany vs EU/EEA HAI Burden (BHAI)

Germany HAI burden (2011–2012, PPS representative sample)

Source: R/data_documentation.R, R/dataset.R
germany_burden.Rd

Median cases, attributable deaths, DALYs, and DALYs per 100,000 by infection type. Values mirror Zacher et al. (2019) using the ECDC PPS 2011–2012 and BHAI methodology.

Usage

germany_burden

germany_burden

Format

A tibble with 5 rows x 5 columns:

hai_type

Infection type: HAP, UTI, BSI, SSI, CDI

cases

Estimated annual cases (median)

deaths

Attributable deaths (median)

dalys

DALYs (median)

dalys_per100k

DALYs per 100,000 population (median)

A tibble with 5 rows and 5 variables:

hai_type

HAP, UTI, BSI, SSI, CDI

cases

Estimated cases (count)

deaths

Attributable deaths (count)

dalys

DALYs (count)

dalys_per100k

DALYs per 100,000 population

Source

Zacher et al., Euro Surveill 2019.
